Online Advertising Services

Our range of Online Advertising Services has been designed to help smaller software businesses significantly increase market reach to their target audiences through engaging and relevant messages.

As buyers spend increasing time on the internet searching for prospective suppliers, smaller software companies should be taking advantage of everything that online advertising has to offer. Our in house team will:

  • Produce effective content for your ads to attract interest
  • Manage, monitor and optimise your online campaigns to deliver value
  • Deliver conversions through effective website landing pages

Successful online advertising campaigns will attract and engage your target audience driving more prospects to your website through the right marketing messages. To find out more about our Online Advertising Services take a look at what we offer below: 

  • Google AdWords
  • Google Remarketing
  • LinkedIn Advertising
  • LinkedIn Sponsored Updates

Smaller software companies who don't want to commit to ongoing and lengthy external marketing agency fees will be pleased to hear that our range of online advertising services are available over flexible periods to suit your needs.  

When considering our SmartMarketing Managed Service that manages the entire process of generating qualified leads, online advertising can be incorporated as part of this programme. 

To discuss these options further, please contact us to arrange a free no obligation consultation on 01536 771440 or click here to register your interest.

Testimonial

"We implemented Act-On in our business about 18 months ago. Before this we had a range of marketing tools and a CRM system which were not integrated. We now have greater visibility of leads and where they come from; we have integrated Act-on into our CRM system and also our web enabled forms. We now have better forensics and can identify our top performing campaigns, webinars or trade events in terms of response and hot leads can be automatically passed to sales. We can prove ROI to the board and accurate measurement helps enormously in budget planning and allocating future marketing spend".
Carole Chandler, Sales & Marketing Director
Halcyon Software
